name: unventilated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a space is unventilated, fresh air cannot enter and move around it: The heat in the unventilated office soon became unbearable. Related word
ventilateOpposite
ventilated
More examplesFewer examplesGerms can spread easily when people are sitting close together in warm and unventilated rooms.Most of the people in the village still prepare their meals in small, unventilated huts.They were kept waiting for over half an hour in an unventilated room.They had assumed that it was better to be on deck in the open air than in the dark and unventilated cargo holds.
